entry.title: Photos Post 23: Mexico
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos from 1985-0530 Shopping, before Lunch, Tijuana, Baja California, Mexico, the very first Photos from Mexico, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1985.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1985. Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters. Jay Śhrī Mātājī!
